page.title: 19Local radio comes to Ashbourne
page.content:
Ashbourne Radio arrived in the town on 26th May 2008. From studios in Windmill Lane, it broadcasts to the Ashbourne area on 96.7 FM, and latterly also Wirksworth and the Ecclesbourne Valley on 101.8. Sister station to High Peak Radio, itâ€™s even smaller but wholly locally-owned and managed also. It broadcasts 24/7/365. Manager Steve Jenner and John Dolby (Sales) have been on-air weekdays since Day1 backed by Ashbourne's own Helen Dennison and Heather Cairney, and a dedicated news and sports team.
David Heathcote
